Cinema, Theater & Music

The stage is set in Bremerhaven!

Ranging from grand opera to musical, theater or cabaret, improvisation and puppet-theater - the ultimate in entertainment is guaranteed in the Seaside City.

Bremerhaven also offers you the best happenings. A visit to one of the comfortable movie theaters is also worthwhile - not only when the weather is bad. Experience live music! In the City Festival Hall (Stadthalle) you can see the big stars. We wish you the best in entertainment!

Our tip: Using the search function you can specifically find the topic you are interested in.
